name: Nexus Light
description:
Description

Maneuver the different levels as fast as possible to reach the nexus cube and move on to the next level all while avoiding the deadly lasers. 

Be quick and maybe you'll make it on the leaderboard (coming soon)

Controls
  • A and D / Left and Right arrow: Move left and right
  • Space / Up arrow: Jump/ Double jump/ Wall jump (must press a direction to wall jump)
  • S / Down arrow: Pound ground (quickly launch yourself to the ground)
  • R: Restart level and timer (lose checkpoint progress)
  • ESC: pause game (does not work in full screen mode)
